column4: is it ok if i upgrade from 6.10 64-Bit Ubuntu to 7.04 32-bit Kubuntu??? will i lose any apps? will i have to reinstall? or do i just use the update manager?
no, it's impossible. You will have to reinstall.
there's no distro in the world where that would be possible.
please take a look at the FAQ <https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CommonQuestions> as linked to in the channel /topic.
don't be sorry; linking you to your answer ;)
